name: Hamboy: AutoChess Survivor
description:
You're a ham warrior sent to save Earth from alien monsters.
Strategically create synergies by combining 12 attributes and 10 types of weapons, and stand against the approaching monsters, surviving for 60 seconds.

Key Features

  • You need to survive 60 seconds for each wave from the monsters approaching the player. The controls are the movement keys and the shift key (special ability), and attacks are made automatically.
  • 12 types of attributes, 10 types of weapon synergies (equipping weapons of the same attribute or type results in a synergy effect, making them stronger)
  • 5 players, 59 weapons allow for a variety of strategic plays (each player has different abilities)
  • Level-up system (if you invest gold in leveling up, the number of weapons you can equip increases. You can equip up to 8 weapons.)
  • Augmentation system (you can upgrade special abilities at intervals of 5 waves)
    You can purchase or recombine weapons at the store during each wave.
  • Interest system (if you save the gold earned by clearing waves instead of spending it, you receive benefits in subsequent waves)
